newsitem.title: GERMANY: BMW calls news conference for Paris show.
newsitem.headline: BMW calls news conference for Paris show.

text.p: German carmaker BMW AG said on Tuesday that it would hold a news conference at the Paris car show at 1300 local time (1100 GMT).
A company spokesman said BMW management board member Bernd Pischetsrieder would attend the briefing.
BMW did not disclose the topic of the news conference, which was to replace a background briefing luncheon for journalists attending the car show.
Germany's Boersen Zeitung said in an article on Tuesday that the news conference would be about a "key strategic decision".
